trans-unit.source: Specifies the serialization flags for a property.
trans-unit.target: Angir serialisering flaggene for en egenskap.

trans-unit.source: DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute provides a constraint hint for the form that designers and design surfaces should use when interacting with the attributed property.
trans-unit.target: DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute gir et tips for begrensningen for skjemaet utviklere og utformingen overflater skal bruke ved å bruke egenskapen attributed.

trans-unit.source: Generally the reason for doing so is to hint <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Årsak til dette er vanligvis så litt <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions>

trans-unit.source: You might do this in cases where interacting with that property as a content-serialized form of the string has risk of introducing spurious white space.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette i tilfeller der samhandling med egenskapen som en innhold serialisert form for strengen har risikoen ved å innføre falske mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: An example case where DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute is applied for this reason is <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel tilfeller der DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute brukes derfor er <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Attribute usage for DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute supports assigning to a method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk for DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute støtter tilordne til en annen metode-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to declare serialization options for a XAML attached property, by assigning DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute on the `Get` accessor method that supports the attached property usage pattern.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig å deklarere serialisering alternativer for en XAML knyttet egenskapen ved å tilordne DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute på den `Get` aksessor metode som støtter bruksmønstret for den tilknyttede egenskap.

trans-unit.source: An example of this in the WPF types is <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace%2A> and its `Get` accessor <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.GetXmlSpace%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Er et eksempel på dette i WPF-typer <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace%2A>og `Get` aksessor <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.GetXmlSpace%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.GetXmlSpace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute hints the desired serialization form, not whether the property is or is not serialized.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute hint skjemaet ønsket serialisering ikke om egenskapen er eller ikke serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: If you want to influence other aspects of property serialization, you can use <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>, or can implement `ShouldSerialize` pattern methods on the owner class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil påvirke andre aspekter ved egenskapen serialisering, kan du bruke <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>, eller du kan implementere `ShouldSerialize` mønsteret metoder for klassen. eieren</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the general .NET serialization patterns for design time, see [Designer Serialization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om generelle .NET serialisering mønstrene for utformingen, se [Designer serialisering oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptionsAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the property is to be serialized.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions"></xref> set on the attribute.
Currently the only possible value is <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste mulige verdien er for øyeblikket <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.DesignerSerializationOptions?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The serialization option, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Serialiseringsalternativet som en verdi av opplistingen.
